sentences: Andrea Benini (born March 14, 1977), better known by his stage name Mop Mop, is an Italian musician and producer.
Mop Mop achieved international recognition when he was included in the soundtrack of Woody Allen's To Rome With Love in 2012.

Mop Mop's single "Run Around", featuring Funk legend Fred Wesley on trombone and Anthony Joseph on vocals, has been charted as best dancefloor jazz track of 2013 according to Red Bull Music Academy Germany.
